Module jtrim.task.graph
Package org.jtrim2.taskgraph.basic

Class CollectingTaskGraphDefConfigurer

java.lang.Object
org.jtrim2.taskgraph.basic.CollectingTaskGraphDefConfigurer
All Implemented Interfaces:
TaskGraphDefConfigurer
public final class CollectingTaskGraphDefConfigurer extends Object implements TaskGraphDefConfigurer
Defines a simple implementation of TaskGraphDefConfigurer which collects the added task factory definitions and simply passes them to a given TaskGraphBuilderFactory.

Thread safety

The methods of this class may not be used by multiple threads concurrently, unless otherwise noted.

Synchronization transparency

The methods of this class are not synchronization transparent in general.
See Also:
  • CollectingTaskGraphBuilder
  • RestrictableTaskGraphExecutor

    CollectingTaskGraphDefConfigurer(TaskGraphBuilderFactory graphBuilderFactory)
    Creates a new CollectingTaskGraphDefConfigurer with the given TaskGraphBuilderFactory to be called when the build() method is called.

  • Constructor Details

    • CollectingTaskGraphDefConfigurer

      public CollectingTaskGraphDefConfigurer(TaskGraphBuilderFactory graphBuilderFactory)
      Creates a new CollectingTaskGraphDefConfigurer with the given TaskGraphBuilderFactory to be called when the build() method is called.
      Parameters:
      graphBuilderFactory - the TaskGraphBuilderFactory to be called when the build() method is called. This argument cannot be null.

  • Method Details

    • factoryGroupDefiner

      public TaskFactoryDefiner factoryGroupDefiner(TaskFactoryGroupConfigurer groupConfigurer)
      Returns a TaskFactoryDefiner through which it is possible to define task node factories. The task factories defined through the returned by this method call will share the same configuration (as specified by the argument). If you need to have task factories with different configurations, you will need to call this method multiple times before creating a TaskGraphBuilder via the build method.

      This implementation allows this method to be called concurrently and also allows concurrent use of the returned TaskFactoryDefiner. However, none of them might be used concurrently with the build() method call.

      Specified by:
      factoryGroupDefiner in interface TaskGraphDefConfigurer
      Parameters:
      groupConfigurer - defines the configuration for the task factories defined through the returned TaskFactoryDefiner. This argument is not allowed to be null.
      Returns:
      a TaskFactoryDefiner through which it is possible to define task node factories. This method may never return null.

    • build

      public TaskGraphBuilder build()
      Creates a TaskGraphBuilder through which you will be able to create the initial task nodes of the execution graph. Only task factories defined before this method call are considered.
      Specified by:
      build in interface TaskGraphDefConfigurer
      Returns:
      a TaskGraphBuilder through which you will be able to create the initial task nodes of the execution graph. This method may never return null.
